name: Tooth Decay (DAFF0111, Anabouy)
description:
Rooty roots root Running from the Evil Toothy Plant Roots that will chew on you. Instructions:
- Move: WASD Keyboard arrows / Gamepad Left stick
- Jump: Space / Left Trigger Dash: Ctrl / X Button
- Shoot: Mouse Left Click / Right Trigger
- Aim: Mouse Pointer / Gamepad Right Stick

Credits:

Animal Companions

Game Made for Global Game Jam 2023
